attributes.action: To improve Motorway Safety by having all Motorways Fully lit at night; having the central barrier raised enough to be a proper safeguard against Heavy Goods Vehicles crossing the reservation and to ensure that one is not dazzled by oncoming headlights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorways are very safe roads.They could be made quite a lot safer. They should all be fully lit at night; the crash barrier should also be high enough to physically prevent Lorries from crossing over the reservation and also to prevent dazzle at night from the headlights of oncoming vehicles -as they do on the Continent.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Motorway-safety/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
